The Ironton City School District has been informed that Ohio Governor Mike DeWine has closed all public and nonpublic schools in Ohio for three weeks beginning Monday, March 16th through Friday, April 3rd with classes resuming on Monday, April 6th. However, Gov. DeWine said a review will be made before reopening any schools, meaning the closures could extend past the three-week mark if warranted.

Please know that we will keep you informed as we learn and gather more information about what will be expected regarding the making-up of lost instructional time and the rescheduling of Ohio State assessments, etc. Informational updates will be shared via tigertown.com, Facebook, and the one call system.

Please check these resources regularly throughout the next three weeks for updates. We encourage all to take the necessary steps to protect your health and the health of others during this time.
